info.name: YouTube compact playlist
info.description:
makes the rows shorter in playlists.
example shown is one of my playlists: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDpo6SvRQ18EXJcIZij5wBGLZtz_g2qvG
info.additionalInfo: changelog: 2017-05-12: also compact playlist on video pages, fix for playlist items that have a note, add space between message-panel and playlist 2016-01-13: also apply to URLs starting with https://www.youtube.com/view_play_list?
